title: Rigged Explosive
desc:
Post 2233
- This card is not a traditional <:explosive:1171223932754473082> card, as the colors that could be the detonation color come from 3 random colors in your hand. (If you don't have 3+ colors, 3 from <:rgby:1107167371048788028> are chosen instead)
- Detonation: The last negative card played will have its effect done to the person who detonated this card. (If no negative card has been played, that player draws 2 cards)
- Dud: Everyone draws 1 card.
